TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示在傳統圖形化使用者介面 (GUI) 內提供基本視窗功能的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that provides fundamental window-based functionality within a traditional graphical user interface (GUI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援此控制項模式的控制項的範例包括最上層的應用程式視窗、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)]子視窗、 強制回應對話方塊和氣球說明視窗。Examples of controls that support this control pattern include top-level application windows, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] child windows, modal dialogs and balloon help windows.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation

summary.span: 取得這個 的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用屬性和其用法，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CanMaximizeProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目傳遞至函式傳回的子系的根，並滿足一組屬性條件的自動化項目集合。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

span.span: Attempts to close the current window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分割窗格控制項上呼叫時，此方法會關閉窗格，並移除相關聯的分割。When called on a split pane control, this method will close the pane and remove the associated split. 這個方法可能也會關閉所有其他窗格視實作而定。This method may also close all other panes depending on implementation. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自而且後續會用來關閉。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is subsequently used to close the . [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#102)]

exception.span: 控制項無法執行要求的動作。

span.span: The control is unable to perform the requested action.

exception.span: 當此控制項已無法再使用時。

span.span: When the control is no longer available.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation

summary.span: 取得這個 的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須介於與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果已取得使用、 它只快取的資料，包含並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用來取得快取先前使用指定的屬性值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用屬性和其用法，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 這類模式識別項傳遞給方法來擷取從指定的控制項模式感興趣的。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool WaitForInputIdle(int32 milliseconds) cil managed
Public Function WaitForInputIdle (milliseconds As Integer) As Boolean

param.name: milliseconds
param.span: 等候相關聯處理序變成閒置的時間量 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the associated process to become idle.
The maximum is .

summary.span: 導致將呼叫程式碼封鎖指定的時間，或直到相關聯的處理序進入閒置狀態 (就看何者先完成)。

span.span: Causes the calling code to block for the specified time or until the associated process enters an idle state, whichever completes first.

returns.span: 如果視窗已進入閒置狀態，則為 ，如果發生逾時，則為 。

span.span: if the window has entered the idle state; if the timeout occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法通常用於處理搭配。This method is typically used in conjunction with the handling of a . 實作會依賴基礎的應用程式架構;因此這個方法可能會傳回一些視窗可供使用者輸入之後的時間。The implementation is dependent on the underlying application framework; therefore this method may return some time after the window is ready for user input. 呼叫端程式碼不應依賴此方法來確定視窗已成為閒置狀態的確切時間。The calling code should not rely on this method to ascertain exactly when the window has become idle. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自，並使用確認的項目是可以在合理的時間內的使用者互動。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and uses to confirm the element is ready for user interaction within a reasonable amount of time. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

exception.span: 傳入的參數不是有效的數字。

span.span: The parameter passed in is not a valid number.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent WindowClosedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly WindowClosedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: 識別視窗關閉時引發的事件。

span.span: Identifies the event that is raised when a window is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端應用程式可能需要接聽從快取的物件，因為視窗移除[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]控制正在關閉時，立即檢視結構。A client application may need to listen for from a cached object since a window is removed from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] control view structure immediately upon being closed. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，宣告事件接聽程式和指定委派和事件。In the following example, event listeners are declared and an delegate is specified for and events. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#104)]
